alert.note: Alert for Northern Oneida (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 4:07AM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...Conditions favorable for fire spread Today... A combination of dry conditions and some wind this afternoon will create an elevated risk of wildfire spread across Northern Oneida county. Minimum relative humidity values this afternoon will range from 25 to 30 percent. Winds should generally gust up to 25 mph. Residents are urged to exercise caution if handling any potential ignition sources, such as machinery, cigarettes, or matches. If dry grasses and tree litter begin to burn, the fire will have the potential to spread rapidly. The overall risk for fire spread may increase Tuesday and Wednesday afternoon as well.
